name: It Never Ends!
description:
This is a project created by 5 masters students at the University of Plymouth:

  • Morgan Ellis - Lead Programmer - morganellisonline@gmail.com
  • Alex Pollard - 2D Artist
  • Mohammad Alsamman - Lead Game Designer & Level Designer
  • Kishen Kalra - UI Artist & Level Designer 
  • Thiago De Sena Pereira - Producer & Game Designer

The uploaded WebGL file is not the final version of the prototype as the dungeon in the game is created via wave function collapse with is to memory intensive for the web version, so if you want to experience the dungeon then you will need to download the game.

Any feedback would be apricated and thank you for taking the time to play.
